cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.SE 

Reasoning: The paper discusses reformulating inference problems using selective conditioning, which is a technique commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) for probabilistic inference. The paper also mentions the use of randomized approximation algorithms (cs.DS) and simulation algorithms (cs.SY) to solve the inference problem. Additionally, the paper discusses the tradeoffs among computational subtasks associated with the selective conditioning approach, which is relevant to software engineering (cs.SE).
